Articles.Content:
Hi,

Love the game had it for about a few months now probably more. think its great. Love the physics behind it and cant wait for 0.17 and planets.

Few questions

anyone else having problems with air craft stability on 0.16? none of my ships or crafts are stable passed about 6k, even with sas modules on the ago, even simple rockets like nose cone, sas, tank, rocket, control surfaces?

Will this run under WINE in Ubuntu linux 12.04 LTS?

top 10 mods or mod packs

Thanks

Hi ancylla, welcome to the community

It's a lot easier to overload your rocket's G meter in 0.16 I find, try throttling back a bit, you are pushing against a lot of air that is robbing you of efficiency as well, though there is also a fuel flow bug in 0.16 which means you can get crazy economy if you use low throttle settings, there's a hacky fix here.

Also, KSP runs well in Wine, I am using Xubuntu 12.04LTS and PlayOnLinux, POL lets me use a version of Wine with the rawinput patch, which allows camera control with the mouse, look here for more info

Top 10 add-ons? Well heres a good place to look.

Edited September 12, 2012 by sal_vager
Thanks for your help, you fixed the first problem, helped me with the second question installing backtrack now and thanks for the Link!
also the hacky fix and the more info link are the same? thanks
Okay I fixed the link, and added it to my signature, i forget to ctrl+c sometimes

Okay I fixed the link, and added it to my signature, i forget to ctrl+c sometimes

Thanks had a look off too set it up, thanks for the warm welcome, i will however warn you, the word "noob" when referring to kerbal space program was invented for me. i define that word. i will warn you now, prepare to groan in your seats and hit your keyboard, and cry that hours of coding and sweat and tears were wasted on me.

thanks again!
Well ancylla, perhaps I can interest you in this helpful tutorial by one of our members

Hello from Portsmouth ancylla

I only occasionally use 3 mods, MecJeb, Kosmos and the floodlights

Oh and Liltrack

Edited September 14, 2012 by UKDan89
